info.name: Skyscrapercity Classic vBulletin Theme v1.4
info.description: Skyscrapercity Classic vBulletin Theme (Light mode)  by  @jakjak3, @gnite, @bad455, @jawik80 from Skyscrapercity forum.
info.additionalInfo:
Skyscrapercity Classic vBulletin Theme (Light mode)  by  @jakjak3, @gnite, @bad455, @jawik80 from Skyscrapercity forum.

v1.4
2020-06-10 Skyscrapercity Classic vBulletin Theme (Light mode) v1.4
* improvements after forum changes
* rearranged quote frames

v 1.3
2020-05-12 Skyscrapercity Classic vBulletin Theme (Light mode) v1.3
* new look of likes list
* improvements on page of followed threads

v 1.2
2020-04-23 Skyscrapercity Classic vBulletin Theme (Light mode) v1.2
* improvements in threads and messages presentation
* added vBulletin smilies in message editor (with javascript: SSC Utility v1.2)

script "SSC Utility v1.2" install from greasyfork.org:
https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/401666-ssc-utility-v1-2

2020-04-06 Skyscrapercity Classic vBulletin Theme (Light mode) v1.1

v 1.0
